text: Minicraft is a surival game devloped by Markus Persson created for a ludum Dare game jam in 48 hours. == Gameplay == It is similar to Minecraft due to how both use an infinite world system and how both have bosses to beat for rewards. ==References== Category:2011 video games Category:Action video games Category:Indie video games Category:Video games developed in Sweden Category:Minecraft Category:Freeware games Category:JavaScript
title: Minicraft
